job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: ltpgtWe are representing a foreign owned multinational engineering and manufacturing company in their search for an Associate Data Scientist that will support the Finance Manager as they scale to grow their North American business operations This is a brandnew position and an opportunity to build it to support the business needs of the CompanyltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtThe ideal candidates favorite words are learning data scale and agility You will leverage your strong collaboration skills and ability to extract valuable insights from highly complex data sets to ask the right questions and find the right answersampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtampnbspltstronggtltpgtltpgtltstronggtResponsibilitiesltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtAnalyze raw data assessing quality cleansing structuring for downstream processingltligtltligtUse SQL to extract data for tools such as Python and RltligtltligtUtilize machine learning tools and predictive analytics to present complex data setsltligtltligtGenerate actionable insights for business improvementsltligtltulgtltpgtltstronggtampnbspltstronggtltpgtltpgtltstronggtQualificationsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtBachelors degree in a quantitative field Decision Science Data Science Statistics Mathematics Computer Science Finance or EconomicsltligtltligtAt least 1  2 years of experience in data science related fieldsltligtltligtDeep understanding of predictive modeling machinelearning clustering and classification techniquesltligtltligtExperience working with SQL and programming languages like Python andor RltligtltligtFamiliarity with Big Data frameworks and visualization tools Hadoop Azure and SparkltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtIf this is you or someone you know Id love to visit with you  Please send your resume to me at ahildebrand361servicescomltpgt
